46790.「なあ！ ミシュアねえちゃん！\n 英雄に必要なものって なんだと思う？:
Hey, Mishua! What do you think it takes to be
a hero?

46793.「ブブー はずれ。\n 英雄ザンクローネ様は こう言ったんだ！:
Bzzzt! Wrong! This is what the hero Zankrone
said once!

46794.「英雄に必要なもんは ふてぶてしさだっ！\n ってさ！ イカすだろ！:
"All it takes to be a hero is to have guts!"
Cool, huh?

46795.「まあっ。すごい英雄さんね。: Wow, he certaintly sounds like a hero.

46796.「それから ザンクローネ様は\n 魔炎の大剣 火燐刀をブン回して……:
And then Zankrone swings his fiery sword
around, the Blazeblade, just like this!

46797.「ザクーーーッ！ メコメコーッ！ って\n 化け物を まっぷたつにしたんだぜ！:
CHOP! WHAM! And then he sliced the monster in
half!

46798.「うふふ。ラスカは 本当に\n ザンクローネ様が好きなのね。:
Wow, Raska. You must be Zankrone's biggest
fan, huh?

46799.「あったりめーだよ！\n オレたちの メルサンディ村の英雄だもん！: You betcha! He's the hero of Melsandy Village!

46803.「てめえ なにもんだ！\n 俺らの村に なんの用で来たべ！:
Who the heck are you? And why did you come
to this village?!

46804.「この辺じゃ 見かけねえな。\n ……あやしい奴だ。\n もしや…… あの化け物:
I've never seen you before and you look
suspicious. Maybe you're working for that
monster!

46805.「サヴァルさん。そんな決めつけは よくないわ。\n 私には 悪い方に見えません。:
Mr. Saval, it's not nice to make assumptions
like that. This person doesn't look bad.

46806.「そーだぞ！ 旅人には優しくしろって\n とーちゃんも言ってたぞ！:
Yeah! And my dad said you gotta be nice to
travelers!

46807.「サヴァル兄は もっとカンダイになれよなー。\n ザンクローネ様みたいにさ！:
You gotta be nicer to people! Just like
Zankrone!

46808.「わ……わかったよ。\n お前たちにゃ かなわねぇさ。: Y-yeah... got it. Sorry about that.

46809.「でもな。子供が こんな時に\n 外をウロウロすんじゃないよ。\n ミシュアさん:
But, hey... kids shouldn't be wandering around
out here this late. Same goes for you, Mishua.

46810.「悪かったな 旅人さんよ。\n だが あんたも こんな時に\n 来ちまうなんてな:
Sorry about that, traveler. I just wasn't
expecting anyone to show up at a time like
this...

46812.「旅の方が いらっしゃったと知ったら\n 村長さんも よろこぶわ。\n ぜひ 家:
The chief will be more than happy to see a
traveler has come here. Please drop by my
house when you can.

46813.「とーちゃんは ケガしてんだから\n 無理すんなって！:
Dad! Don't push yourself so hard! You're still
injured!

46814.「もし また化け物が現れても\n ザンクローネ様が 絶対 助けにきてくれるよ！:
If the monster shows up again, I'm sure
Zankrone will be there to save us!

46815.「ラスカ お前も見ただろう。\n ザンクローネ様が 死んじまったとこを……。:
Raska, I know you saw it too.
How Zankrone died...

46816.「ザンクローネ様は 英雄なんだ！\n 化け物なんかに やられたりしねえよ！:
Zankrone's a hero! He'd never let a monster
like that beat him!

46817.「英雄だろうが なんだろうが\n ダメなときはダメだべぇ！: Hero or not, stop being so delusional!

46819.「あんた まさか 旅人さんか？\n いんやァ よく来なすった！\n 俺が この村:
You're a traveler, aren't you?! Of course!
Welcome, welcome! I am the chief of this
village. Call me Gash!

46822.「うぇるかむ 我がメルサンディ村へ！\n ……と言っても 今は ちょいと\n 歓:
Welcome to Melsandy Village! Sorry that I'm
not in the best shape to give you a proper
welcome, but...

46824.「お前さんも ここに来るまでに見ただろうよ。\n やせた畑に 枯れた井戸 壊れた:
You've seen it all, haven't you? The barren
fields, the dry wells, the broken houses, the
frightened villagers...

46825.「……この村は 得体の知れねえ\n 化け物に襲われとるんだ。:
The village has been attacked numerous times
by monsters of all kinds...

46826.「はじめは でかい足だった。\n でかい足の化け物が 突如 村に現れて\n 村人:
The first time was a monster with big feet.
It suddenly appeared in the village and began
trampling the villagers.

46827.「そのときは 村の英雄 ザンクローネ様が\n 化け物を 退治してくれたのよ。:
That's when Zankrone showed up and got rid of
it for us.

46828.「だけんど 先日……\n 今度は でかい頭の化け物が 現れおった。\n そいつは:
But, just the other day... a monster with a
big head appeared, and was flying around
the village...

46829.「村人たちを かたっぱしから\n むしゃむしゃ食っちまったんだ！: It began eating the villagers whole!

46830.「俺は 足にケガを負って……\n 何も…… できなかった……。:
Since my leg is injured, I... I couldn't
do anything to help them...

46831.「……ザンクローネ様は そのときも\n 村のために 命を賭して戦ってくださった。:
Zankrone still risked his life to fight for
the village. He fought the monster head on...

46832.「だから この村にはもう 救いはねえ。\n 村人たちも 不安がるっちゅうもんだ…:
And so the village lost all hope... the
villagers are all so anxious...

46833.「今こそ 俺が がんばらにゃ……。: I have to do what's best for the village...

46834.「ガッシュのおやっさん！\n これが 村の門の外に……。:
Chief Gash, I found this outside the village
gate!

46835.「こりゃ…… となりのデニーが\n いつもかぶってる帽子でねえか！\n な 何が:
Isn't that... the hat that Denny always wears?
What's going on?!

46836.「もしかして また\n 化け物が現れたんじゃ……？: Do you think the monster came back...?

46837.「心配すんなって！\n 絶対 ザンクローネ様が助けに……:
Don't worry! I'm sure Zankrone will come to
save the day!

46838.「ラスカ。ザンクローネ様は もういねえんだ。 \n また 化け物が現れたかもしれ:
Raska. Zankrone is no longer with us. We
can't rely on a dead hero to protect us from
monsters anymore.

46844.「おじさま。私が見てまいります。: Don't worry. I'll go find him.

46846.「ミシュアには 頭があがらんなあ。: I can always count on her...

46847.「……ウォッホン。\n サヴァル すぐに村中を回って\n デニーの捜索にあたって:
Saval, I want you to search the village right
away to try and find Denny.

46848.「騒がしくて申し訳ねえだ 旅人さん。\n 見ての通り 村は 大変な状況でよ……。:
I apologize about such a terrible first
impression. As you can see, the village is
not in a good state right now...

46849.「……ふむ。お前さん \n どうやら なかなか旅慣れていそうだべな。:
Hmmm... you seem like you've seen your fair
share of adventures.

46850.「ほう。<pc>と言うだか。\n すまんが <pc>\n ひとつ 頼まれてくれん:
Hm. You said your name was <pc>?
I hate to ask, but do you think you could
do me a favor?

46851.「俺のおふくろは 村を出て 北西にある \n メルン水車郷で 水車の管理人をしと:
My mother is the manager of the Melun
Watermill, northwest of the village. I'm
worried about her being there all alone.

46852.「村のことで手いっぱいの 俺に代わって\n おふくろを 迎えに行ってきてほしいの:
Do you think you could pick her up for me?
I have my hands full with things here, so I
can't do it myself.

46853.「来て早々の 旅人さんに\n 面倒をかけて申し訳ないが……\n 人助けと思って:
I apologize for so much trouble since you just
got here... but please consider lending us a
helping hand.

46854.「じゃあ 俺も 村の見回りに行くんで\n おふくろのこと くれぐれも よろしく頼:
I'm going to do my rounds in the village, so
I'm trusting you to take care of her for me.
Don't worry, I'll reward you for your efforts.

46856.「ここに いるんじゃないかと思ったの。\n ねえ ラスカ……。: I thought I'd find you here...

46857.「なんだよ ミシュアねえちゃんには\n カンケーねえだろ……ぐすっ。:
Why are you here? What do you care?
*sniff*...

46858.「たとえ すべての麦が倒れ\n 水が干上がり 涙が枯れても……:
Even if the wheat withers, the water
evaporates, and your tears run dry...

46859.「お前の声が かれない限り\n 救いは 必ず訪れる。: Hope will remain if your voice stays true.

46861.「ねえちゃん いつの間に覚えたの？\n ザンクローネ様の決めゼリフ！:
Hey, where did you learn that? That's
Zankrone's signature phrase!

46862.「ラスカから たくさん\n お話を聞いたから 覚えちゃったわ。:
You've told me the story so many times
that I memorized it.

46863.「でも とーちゃんは あいつは死んだんだって\n もう 助けにこないって言うんだ:
But... Dad said that he's gone... and he won't
ever come to save the day again...

46865.「信じて 待っていてくれる人が\n ひとりでもいる限り……。:
As long as there is just one person who
believes strongly enough...

46866.「村に来る前に 誰かから\n ……そう 聞いた気がするの。:
Somebody told me that before I came here to
this village...

46868.「ええ。でもね ガッシュのおじさまは\n 村に住む みんなを 守らなきゃいけない:
Yes. But it's your father's job to protect
everyone in the village. That's why he's
being cautious.

46869.「お父さんの気持ちも\n ラスカは わかってあげられるよね？: You can understand his feelings, right?

46871.「……いい子ね。\n あなたが 希望を持ち続ける限り\n ザンクローネ様は きっ:
Good boy. As long as you keep your hope alive,
I'm certain Zankrone will be just fine.

46873.「ハアー 金 銀 ぷらちな\n ザックラホイ♪\n 人生金色 ヨヨイノヨイ♪:
Platinum, silver, and glittery gold! ♪
An amazing sight, even when you're old! ♪

46874.「ちょいこら そこの若僧！\n ノックもなしに うちの敷居をまたぐたあ\n いい:
You there! Ya' got some nerve comin'
in my place without knockin', kiddo!

46875.「あたしは この水車の管理人 コペだよ。\n 粉が引きたきゃ 使用料払いな。\n:
I'm Kope, and I run this watermill. If ya
wanna grind flour, ya gotta pay the fee.
Money spins the mill, ya know.

46876.「…………アァン？\n 化けモンが出て 危険だから\n ……あたしを 迎えにきた:
Huh? Ya' came ta' get me because I'm in
danger? There's a monster out there?

46877.「ハン！ ぬかすんじゃないよ 若ヒョットコ！\n あたしゃ ここが気に入ってんの:
Bah! Don't get smart with me, ya little punk!
I like it here. How can ya take me back to
the village just like that?

46878.「化けモンだか シナモンだか知らないけど\n そんなのに やられるほど\n あた:
I don't care if it's a monster or a
cinnamon bun. I ain't so soft that it's gonna
get me!

46879.「……まったく あのトンカチ息子は\n ろくに 顔も見せずに\n こんな若いのを:
How can that no good son o' mine send a
youngin' here without showing his own face
himself?

46880.「しかし せっかく活きのいいのが来たんだから\n お手伝いでも してもらおうかね:
Well now... since a strong youngster such as
yourself is here, might as well make yourself
useful.

46881.「最近 水車の回りが悪くてさ。\n たぶん 歯車に 何か はさまってんだわな。:
The waterwheel has been runnin' poorly as of
late. Maybe somethin' is stuck in the gears.

46882.「水車小屋のカギは 開けてあるから \n ちょっくら 直してきておくれよ。:
The water cabin is unlocked, so please go and
see what's wrong.

46883.「さあ とっとと行きな。\n たいむ いず ごーるど！ だよ！:
Now scram, whippersnapper! Don't come back
until it's fixed!

46884.「いやーん バーティ\n そっち押し込んでぇ！: Naw, Buttre! Jam it in there!

46885.「まかせて ジャーミィ\n あと ひといきよ～！: Almost there, Jammy! Just a bit more...!

46887.「ふう しびれくらげを\n 水車の歯車に はさむ仕事は\n 骨が折れるわねぇ。:
Whew! It sure is hard to jam this thing into
the gears!

46888.「でも 楽しいわ～。\n 生きがいを感じるわ～。: But it sure is fun! Makes you feel alive!

46889.「あの方に たっぷり\n ほめてもらわなきゃねぇ。: Think of all the praise we're gonna get...

46891.「おややん？ まずいわぁ。\n まだ 見つかっちゃダメって 言われてたのに。:
Yuh oh! This is bad! We can't let anyone
find out!

46892.「今日のところは\n 逃げるが カチカチパンよ～。:
We'll let you off the hook today! Let's
skedaddle!

46895.「……って なんで あんたは\n ノックもせずに 入ってくるんだい！\n まった:
Why do ya burst in here without knockin'?
Young people these days have no respect...

46896.「フン。どうやら 水車は直せたようだね。\n ちっとは 役に立つじゃないか。\n:
Hmph. Looks like you were useful after all
fixing the watermill. Don't just stand there!
C'mere.

46897.「さてさて 次は何をやってもらおうかねえ。\n 家中のクモの巣とりか 煙突掃除…:
Now what shall ya do next? I got cobwebs to
clean, a chimney to sweep... the flowerbeds
could really have their weeds pulled too...

46898.「ほうきで床をはいて ぞうきんがけ\n 窓ふき タンスの片付け\n 芝を刈って:
I've already broomed the floor, dusted the
windows, cleaned out the wardrobe, mowed the
lawn, picked up trash from the creek...

46900.「おや また遊びに来たのかい 家出娘。:
Oh, looks like the runaway gal's come ta'
visit again.

46901.「はい。おばあさまに\n 会いたくなっちゃって。:
Yes. I missed you so I thought I'd come by
and see you.

46902.「<pc>さん お疲れさま。\n ここに いらっしゃると聞いたので\n 私も お:
Good work, <pc>. I heard you
came by, so I came to lend a hand.

46903.「……ねえ コペおばあさま。\n 近頃 出没する化け物は 本当に恐ろしくて\n:
Hey, Mrs. Kope... the monsters that have been
appearing lately are really scary, and Mr.
Gash is worried about you.

46904.「私も おばあさまが心配よ……。\n どうか 一緒に 村へ帰りましょう。:
I'm worried about you too, so... please come
back to the village with me.

46905.「なんだい つまらないね。あんたも\n トンカチ息子の 回しモンってことかい。:
What's the matter with ya? Yer just another
one of those blockheads, aren't ya?

46906.「フン！ だいたい心配なら ガッシュが\n 自分で迎えにくりゃ いいじゃないのさ:
Hmph! If Gash is so worried about me, why
doesn't he check up on me himself?

46907.「いつもいつも 村のことばかりで\n ちっとも かまってくれないしさ。\n あん:
He's always talkin' about the village and
never gave me a second thought. I didn't
raise him like that.

46908.「あらあら。でもね おばあさま。\n ラスカは とっても\n 会いたがっていまし:
My goodness... but you know what? Raska misses
you very much.

46910.「ええ！ おばあさまに\n ザンクローネ様が 大活躍した昔話を\n いっぱい 教:
Yes! He said he wanted to ask his grandmother
to tell him stories about how Zankrone saved
the world.

46911.「そうかい……。\n ラスカが そんなことを……。: I see... Well, if Raska really did say that...

46912.「おお！ ……そういえば ほったらかしだった\n ヘソクリを 取りにいこうと思っ:
Oh! I was thinkin' of pickin' up the stash
I've been neglecting. Well, I guess I'll have
to go back fer' a bit anyways.

46913.「……そうだ！ あたしが荷物をまとめてる間に\n あんたたち もうひと仕事 頼ま:
Oh yeah! While I'm packin' my bags, you guys
can take care of one more job for me.

46914.「水車に また何か はさまると困るから\n 小川の掃除をしてほしかったのさ。:
Can ya clean up the creek just in case
somethin' gets stuck in the waterwheel again?

46915.「しばらく 水車小屋を空けるんだから\n しっかり頼んだよ。:
I'm gonna be away from the waterwheel fer' a
while, so make sure it's spotless!

46917.「<pc>さん 一緒に\n がんばりましょうね！<yesno><close>:
Come on, <pc>.
Let's do it together!<yesno><close>

46918.「この お手伝いが終われば\n おばあさまも 気持ちよく\n 村へ 帰ってくださ:
If we help her, I think she'll be happy to
go back to the village.

46919.「もう少しだけ おチカラを\n 貸していただけませんか？<yesno><clos:
Please? It shouldn't take too long if we do
it together.<yesno><close>

46920.「ありがとう <pc>さん！\n 必要な掃除道具は 水車小屋の裏の桟橋に\n あ:
Thank you! The cleaning supplies we need are
on the dock behind the cabin, so let's head
over that way.

46921.「さあ <pc>さん。\n はりきって お掃除しましょう。:
All right, <pc>. Let's clean up
this mess.

46922.「うん！ とってもキレイになったわね。\n 小川のお掃除 お疲れさまでした。:
Good! It's looks nice and pretty now.
You did a great job cleaning it!

46923.「<pc>さんは ずっと\n 遠い場所から 来たんですってね。\n メルサンディ:
So I heard you came from a pretty faraway
place. Do you think Melsandy Village is a
nice place, too?<yesno><close>

46924.「そう…… よかった。\n 自分のことみたいに うれしいわ。:
I see... I'm glad to hear that. Seeing you
happy makes me happy too.

46925.「そうね……。今は 化け物が現れて\n 大変なことになっているものね。:
I see... things are pretty bad in the village
right now, with the monsters and all.

46926.「……私も あの村の人間ではないの。\n 行き倒れていたところを 拾われて\n:
I'm actually not from the village... I was
found lying on the ground by the chief, and
that's where I've been staying.

46928.「私には それ以前の記憶がないの。: I don't remember anything before that.

46929.「目が覚めた時には 何も覚えていなかった……。\n 何をしてきたか 何をしたらい:
When I woke up, I couldn't remember anything.
I had no idea of why I was there or what I
was supposed to be doing.

46930.「でも あの村の人たちは\n こんな私を 受け入れてくれたわ。\n ここで生きて:
But the people in that village accepted me as
one of their own and let me live there.

46931.「ラスカと ガッシュのおじさまも\n すごく よくしてくれて……: Raska and Mr. Gash were very nice to me...

46932.「お前は 俺たちの家族だって\n 村長さんの家に 代々 受け継がれてきた\n こ:
"You're part of the family", he said. He gave
me this pin which has been passed down
from generation to generation in his family.

46933.「私は 荒れ果ててしまった\n メルサンディ村しか 知らないけれど\n あたたか:
I've only seen Melsandy in its current bad
state, but I love the warmth of its people.

46934.「だから 私……\n あの村で 生きていこうって 決めたの。: So that's why... I decided to live there.

46936.「あら かわいい！\n どうやら <pc>さんを\n 呼んでいるみたいね。:
Oh my, how cute! Looks like it's trying to get
your attention, <pc>.

46938.「プレゼントのつもりなのかしら？ \n きっと 川に落ちていたのを拾ったのね！:
I wonder if that was meant as some kind of
present? It must've found it in the creek!

46939.「荷物が まとまったよ。\n そっちのほうは どうだい？:
I've got my stuff ready. How's it going
over there?

46941.<pc>は 紅蓮の大宝石を\nコペに 奪われた！:
Kope snatched the Bright Red Gem from
<pc>!

46942.「たっまげたねぇ！\n こんなに 途方もなく大きくって\n キラキラした宝石 あ:
How amazing! I've never seen such a
huge sparkling jewel in my life!

46943.「川に落ちてるもんは み～んな\n 水車小屋の管理人である あたしのもんだわね。:
Everythin' that falls in this here river
belongs to me, the caretaker. I'll be hangin'
onto this, thank you.

46944.「さあ コペおばあさま <pc>さん。\n そろそろ 村に帰りましょうか。:
All right, I'm finished. Why don't we head
back to the village now?

46945.「フン。あたしゃ 自分のヘソクリを \n 取りに帰るだけだよ。:
Hmph. Remember, I'm only goin' for my stash.
That's it.

46946.「そうか デニーは まだ見つからんか……。: I see... so Denny still hasn't been found...

46947.「ああ。みんなに聞いてまわったけど\n 誰も 姿を見てねえそうだべ。:
Yeah. I asked around, but nobody knows where
he could be.

46948.「俺は もう少し 村ん中を探そう……。\n サヴァル お前は 門の見張りを頼む。:
I'll search a little more in the village...
Saval, you watch the gate.

46949.「お！ コペばーさんじゃねえか。\n ずいぶん ひさしぶりだベな。\n ガッシュ:
Oh! Well, if it isn't Kope. It's been awhile.
Please don't give the chief a hard time!

46952.「化け物にやられて 干からびとったら\n 俺ァ どうしたもんかと……:
I don't know what I would've done if any
monsters hurt you...

46954.「フン！ このトンカチ息子！\n 心配なら 自分で迎えにこんかい。:
Hmph! Ya big blockhead! If you were so
worried, ya should have picked me up
yerself!

46955.「わ 悪かったべよ。\n 俺も 手いっぱいでよゥ……。:
I-I'm sorry... but I really have my hands
full right now...

46956.「言い訳なんか 聞きたかないよ！\n それより あの子は……？:
I don't wanna hear yer excuses! What about
that boy?

46958.「ラ ラスカ……！\n しばらく見ないうちに 大きくなって！:
Ra.. Raska! Oh, it's been so long! Look at
you! You're so big now!

46959.「えー！ オレ そんなに背ぇ伸びてねえぞ。\n そんなことより ザンクローネ様の:
Huh? I'm haven't grown THAT much. Anyways,
I've been waitin' for you to tell me more
stories about Zankrone!

46960.「しようのない子だねえ……。: What a hopeless child you are...

46961.「<pc>。お迎え ご苦労だったベなあ。\n ささやかだけど 礼を用意させてもら:
Thanks a bunch for helping me out.
I've prepared a little something for you to
show my thanks!

46962.「お前さんには この村の宿屋の\n びっぷるーむを お取りしたべよ！\n 休む時:
We reserved you a room at the inn here in the
village! Feel free to use it whenever you need
to rest.

46963.「宿屋の おかみには 伝えてあっから\n 話しかけりゃ 部屋まで案内してくれんべ:
The innkeeper already knows, so she'll show
you to your room if you talk to her.

46964.「ほんだら 俺は まだ捜索が残っとるから\n おふくろたちは家に帰って ゆっくり:
Well, I still have a lot of searching to do.
You all should get some rest.

46966.「フフン。さっきは とりあげて悪かったね。\n 孫の顔を見たら 気が変わったよ。:
I'm sorry fer takin' this away from ya
earlier. I changed my mind when I saw my
grandson's face.

46967.「……ほらよ お駄賃だ。これ 持ってお行き。: Here, it's not much. Take it with ya.

46968.<pc>は 紅蓮の大宝石（だいじなもの）を\nふたたび 受け取った！<me 60:
<pc> received
the Bright Red Gem (Key Item) once again!<me 60>

46972.「ガッシュさん……！\n きょ 巨大な手の化け物が……\n 誰かを引きずって 村:
This g-giant hand appeared out of nowhere
and... dragged someone out of the village!

46975.「ローティ 大丈夫かい！？\n ケガしてないかい？: Are you okay, Roti?! Are you hurt?

46976.「ええ 私は無事よ……。\n それより 連れ去られた人が\n 心配だわ……。:
Yeah, I'm fine... but I'm more worried about
that person the monster took...

46977.「あの化け物は 村の西にある\n こもれびの広場の方へ 逃げていったわ。:
The monster fled towards Sunbeam Square
to the west of the village.

46981.「さっき 引きずり込まれたのは\n もしかして ミシュアなのか！？: Was that Mishua who was taken?!

46983.「オレが ザンクローネ様を探すって\n 家を飛び出したら 化け物がいて……:
I ran out of the house to find Zankrone and I
saw that monster...

46985.「な なんてこったァ……。: What the hell is going on...

46986.「後を追ったんだけど……\n オ オレ…… \n 何も できな……かっ…………。:
I followed it here, b-but I... I couldn't...
...do anything...

46987.「……もうええ。ここは危険だ。\n ミシュアは 俺が助けにいくから\n お前は:
Don't worry.... but it's not safe here. I
will rescue Mishua. Please go back to the
village with Saval.

46991.「そうだ…… オレ\n ザンクローネ様と約束したんだ。: That's right... I made a promise to Zankrone.

46993.<center>ちょっとの勇気がありゃ\n誰だって 英雄になれんだよ。: With a little courage, anyone can be a hero.

46994.<center>ケガしちまった 親父に代わって\nお前が 家族を守れ。\nお前自:
Your father's injured, so it's up to you to
protect your family. It's time for you to be a
hero!

46995.「そう 約束したんだ。\n ……オレが 家族を守るって。:
That's right. I made a promise to protect my
family...

46998.「落ちつけ…… おやっさん！\n そんな足で 何ができるべ！？:
Calm down, chief! You'll go nowhere fast
with that leg!

47000.「<pc>……。\n 頼む…… 手を貸してくれ……。:
<pc>.... I'm begging you...
Please lend me a hand...

47001.「今の俺にゃ 息子を……\n そして 娘を助けられねえ……。:
I'm in no condition to save my son or my
daughter...

47002.「うちの子らを……\n 頼むゥ… 助けてくれェ…………。: Please... help me save... my children...

47004.「……やべぇ。すげー熱だ。\n 大ケガしてんのに 無茶するからだよ……。:
Oh man, you're really burning up. That's what
you get for being reckless with a broken
leg...

47005.「ガッシュのおやっさんは\n 俺が責任をもって 村に連れ帰る。\n あいつらのこ:
I'll take Gash back to the village, so don't
worry. We're counting on you to rescue the
others...

47006.「ミ…… ミシュアねえちゃんを離せ！\n この…… 化け物ヤロー！！: L-let go of M-mishua! You damn m-monster!!!

47009.「<cs_pchero>……！ おまえ つえーんだな！\n すっげー 助かったぞ:
Wow, <cs_pchero>! That was so cool!
You saved my life!

47012.「助けにきてくれて ありがとう。\n あなたは 立派な英雄ね！:
Thank you for coming to save me. You truly
are a hero!

47017.<center>水が干上がり 涙が枯れても: ...the water evaporates, your tears run dry...

47018.<center>お前の声が かれない限り: Hope will remain if your voice stays true...

47020.<center>俺は 必ず駆けつける！: And I will surely be there!

47021.「待たせたな ボウズ！: Sorry to keep you waiting, kid!

47023.「まったく 俺がいないと\n てんでダメだな お前らは！:
Jeez... you do realize you'd all be toast
without me, don't you?

47024.「まあ いいぜ……。\n 黙って 俺の背中を見てな。: Well, all right... just stand back and watch.

47025.「さあ 遊ぼうか おててちゃん。: Come on, let's play! Ya dumb hand!

47026.「焼きあがれ！ 魂が焦げるほどにッ！: I'll burn your souls to a crisp!

47027.「カ…… カッケーーーーー！！\n ザンクローネ様 やっぱり生きてたんだな！:
Sooooooooo cooooooool!
So you really are still alive!

47028.「そう簡単にゃ くたばんねえよ。\n だけど まあ……\n 今回ばかりは そこそ:
I won't go down that easy. But, well...
This time, I'm feeling pretty beat...

47029.「前の戦いの時 負ったダメージで\n ろくに 身体が動かなくなっちまってな。 \:
The damage I took in my last battle left me
stuck. I turned my soul into that crystal and
gave myself time to recover.

47030.「おい お前！ なんてったっけ……\n そうだ <cs_pchero>！:
Hey, you! What was your name again...
Oh yeah! <cs_pchero>!

47031.「お前の懐にいた時 熱い魂の鼓動を感じた。\n おかげで キズが早く癒えたのさ。:
I could feel your burning soul when you held
my crystal... it really helped my wounds heal
faster. I owe you one!

47032.「それから…… ラスカ。\n 俺を呼ぶ声 確かに届いたぞ。:
And you, Raska... your voice definitely got
through to me.

47033.「どんな時も 希望は捨てんな。\n メルサンディ村は 俺とともにある！:
Never give up hope. Leave Melsandy Village to
me!

47035.「……ありがとう <cs_pchero>さん。\n あなたが 来てくれたから\n:
Thank you, <cs_pchero>... I think
it's your being here that this miracle
happened.

47036.「やっぱり 英雄は 死なないのね……: I knew it. Heroes never die...

47040.「……あれ？\n ミシュアねえちゃんは どこ行ったんだ？\n 先に 帰っちゃった:
Huh? Where's Mishua? Did she head home
already?

47041.「これって ねえちゃんの かみかざりだよな？\n 落とすなんて そそっかしいぜ…:
This is Mishua's, isn't it? Kinda careless to
just leave it here... I'll give it to her
later.

47043.「…………あれ？\n ここ…… どこなんでしょう？: Huh...? What's going on? Where am I?

47044.「うお！ 行方不明のデニーじゃん。\n とっくに 化け物に 食われちまったと\n:
Whoah! It's Denny! I thought the monsters had
already eaten you.

47045.「おお そうでした！\n 私 化け物に つかまったんでした～。\n はやく 帰っ:
Yes, that's right! That monster captured me!
I'd better hurry back and let everyone know
I'm okay!

47046.「さあ メルサンディ村に帰ろうぜ！: Come on, let's go back to the village!

47047.「……そこでさ！ ザンクローネ様は\n 魔炎の大剣 火燐刀をブン回して……:
And then Zankrone swung his fiery sword
around, the Blazeblade, just like this!

47048.「ザクーーーッ！ メコメコーッ！ って\n 化け物を まっぷたつにしたんだぜ！:
CHOP! WHAM! And then he sliced the monster in
half!

47050.「ザンクローネ様は 本物の英雄だべな。\n この村の 誇りだァ……。:
Zankrone is a true hero. He's the pride of
our village...

47052.「俺の子供たちを 助けてくれて\n 本当に ありがとよォ <pc>！！\n お前:
Thank you so much for saving my children!
I had no doubt you would do it!

47053.「ほれ ミシュアも\n こっちに来て 礼を言え！:
Hey, Mishua! Come over here and say thank
you!

47055.「なに言ってんの ミシュアねえちゃん。\n さっき助けてくれた <pc>じゃん！:
What are you talking about, Mishua?
<pc> here just saved your life!

47057.「そういやぁ そんな気がすんなぁ。\n ……いんや！ そうだっただ！:
Well, I don't know....
....wait! That's right!

47059.「ほら ミシュアねえちゃん！ \n かみかざり 落ちてたぜ。: Hey, Mishua! You dropped your hairpin.

47060.「落としちゃダメじゃん 大事なもんなんだろ！:
Don't drop it next time! It's really
important!

47061.「おお！ どこいっちまったかと\n 探しとったんだわぁ。: Oh! I was wondering where that went!

47063.「なぁ おとっつぁん。この 蝶のかみかざり\n <pc>に あげてもええだか？:
Hey, Dad... can I give the hairpin to
<pc>?

47068.「<pc>。本当は そんなもんじゃ\n 感謝を 伝えきれねえくらいだが……:
I truly can't thank you enough,
<pc>...

47069.「この村を 救ってくれて ありがとう。\n 村人みんなの 親父として 礼を言うべ:
Thank you for saving this village. As the
chief, you have my utmost gratitude.

49081.「コペおばあさま！\n <pc>さんのおかげで\n 小川も すごくキレイになった:
Guess what? Thanks to <pc>, the
creek looks so beautiful.

49082.「そうだわ！ 帰る前に 花壇のお花に\n お水を あげておかなくちゃ。:
Oh, that's right! I have to water the
flowerbed before I leave.

50213.「おお もちろんだべ！ \n 子供たちを 救ってくれた礼に値するのは\n 家宝の:
Oh, of course! Please take our family
heirloom, the Butterfly Hairpin, for saving
my children!

50217.「うん！ <pc>は ザンクローネ様の\n 次くらいに カッコよかったぜ！:
Yeah!! <pc> is the second coolest
hero I've ever seen next to Zankrone!

50218.「オラ なんかよぉ お礼がしてえんだぁ。: I'd like to show my thanks.

70592.水車は 勢いよく 回り始めた！: The waterwheel began turning with much force!

70593.「フン！ あたしにゃ関係ないけどね。: Hmph! Not that I give a damn.

70594.<pc>と ミシュアは\nしばらくの間 熱心に 小川を掃除した！:
<pc> and Mishua diligently cleaned
the creek!

70595.「永遠の 二番手だけどな！: You'll always be second best, though!

74057.「やっぱり 似合うべえ。\n 死んだ かあちゃんに そっくりだあ。:
It suits you very well. You look just like
your late mother.

74058.「…………ふう。\n 孫のラスカは 元気かねえ。: *sigh* I wonder how Raska is doing...
